name: NO YOLKS® Creamy Chicken Noodle Casserole
author: NO YOLKS(R)
summary: A comforting and delicious casserole featuring chicken, veggies, tons of cheese and of course always smooth, firm and delicious NO YOLKS® Noodles.
ingredients: 6 ounces NO YOLKS® Extra Broad Noodles
3 medium (blank)s medium carrots, peeled and sliced
1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, softened
2  breast half, bone and skin removed (blank)s cooked chicken breasts, chopped
1 pinch Salt and pepper, to taste
directions: Combine topping ingredients and set aside
Add olive oil to a 7-quart stock pot, and saute mushrooms, celery, carrots, onions and garlic powder for 3-4 minutes over medium heat
Add chicken broth and thyme sprig and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally
Add cream cheese, Parmesan and noodles
Sprinkle flour over top of mixture
Stir and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until mixture begins to thicken
Remove from oven and let stand 10 minutes
